alert.note: Alert for Banks; Clarke; Jackson; Madison (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Banks, north central Clarke, eastern Jackson and southwestern Madison Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Apple Valley, or near Commerce, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Commerce, Arcade, Nicholson, Ila, Athens-Clarke County, Peach State Speedway, Sandy Creek Recreation Area, Apple Valley, Neese and Barretts Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
